verbs.description: [ARG0: German Chancellor Angela Merkel] [V: met] [ARG1: with President Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in the White House] [ARGM-PRP: for a three - hour working session] . Iran topped the agenda , along with Syria , trade and NATO . Her visit followed one by French President Emmanuel Macron two days earlier .
